item.title: Data Scientist Profile
item.description: Profile summary 15+ years of experience in mathematical modelling, programming, and quantitative science Strong knowledge and practical skills in machine learning, deep learning, statistical inference, and modern data tools/platforms Work with world’s leading apparel brands and retailers including The North Face, Zara, Asos, Zalando, Adidas and many more Technical skills Languages: SQL, R, Go, Python, Julia, C/C++, Fortran, Mathematica, bash scripts Techniques: Deep learning (TensorFlow), reinforcement learning / multi-armed bandit, machine learning, statistics, finite difference method, linear algebra, Fourier analysis Professional experiences Data Scientist at Fit Analytics GmbH, Berlin, Germany Feb 2016 â€“ Now
